item.title: Discover My Infrastructure
item.description: Welcome to My Homelab üñ•Ô∏è This page showcases the infrastructure powering my portfolio, running on a self-hosted Proxmox node. Key Components: Proxmox Node: The heart of my homelab, hosting multiple virtual machines. Virtual Machines: Running containerized applications and services. Networking Equipment: Ensuring seamless connectivity and security. Storage & Backup: Optimized for performance and reliability. Explore the details to see how I leverage cutting-edge tools to build scalable and robust environments.
